bioconda.name: bioconductor-oppar
bioconda.summary: Outlier profile and pathway analysis in R

biotools.summary: The R implementation of mCOPA package. This package provides methods for Cancer Outlier Profile Analysis. Although initially developed to detect outlier genes in cancer studies, its methods can be used for outlier profile analysis in general. In addition, tools are provided for gene set enrichment and pathway analysis.

bioschemas.name: oppar
bioschemas.summary: The R implementation of mCOPA package. This package provides methods for Cancer Outlier Profile Analysis. Although initially developed to detect outlier genes in cancer studies, its methods can be used for outlier profile analysis in general. In addition, tools are provided for gene set enrichment and pathway analysis.
